----- Original Message -----
From: Don and Crys Meaker <famromo@...>
To: <Unschooling-dotcom@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, November 09, 1999 7:59 AM
Subject: [Unschooling-dotcom] Intro from Crys


> From: "Don and Crys Meaker" <famromo@...>
>
> Hi there,
>
> I'm Crys and I have been teaching and learning from Terry (3/31/97)
> and Lapis (2/11/99) since the day they were born. I would call it
> unschooling if I had to call it anything, but if I really had to call it
> something I would simply call it life <G>.
>
Hi and Welcome!!

Wouldn't it be wonderful if we could just call it life. <G>

messages.subject: Intro from Crys
messages.msgSnippet: Hi there, I m Crys and I have been teaching and learning from Terry (3/31/97) and Lapis (2/11/99) since the day they were born.  I would call it unschooling if
messages.messageBody:
Hi there,

I'm Crys and I have been teaching and learning from Terry (3/31/97)
and Lapis (2/11/99) since the day they were born. I would call it
unschooling if I had to call it anything, but if I really had to call it
something I would simply call it life <G>.

I have been noticing that Lapis learns from Terry (who I have taken
to calling my assistant or little helper) who learns from her father
and I, who STILL learn from our parents <G>.

I hope to learn a great deal here. Perhaps even meet parents in
the Katy/Sealy Texas area <G> ????

Pax,
Crys
